title: @Riot, Have you fixed the bugs/issues with re-arranging rune pages yet?
body: I really want to be able to _use a **feature** that you implemented into the new client without having it fuck all my shit up_, thanks!

replies.body:
We did actually notice that most of those problems were coming from people naming multiple rune pages something very similar or using special characters. It would also happen when trying to rearrange your rune pages and something didn't get saved correctly. 

Those issues should be smoothed out at this point, but if you're still having problems with some pages just let us know.

BROPORO HALP ALL MY PAGES ARE SCREWED UP AGAIN.

I literally can't play league because I have no runes.
Lemme know which ones aren't working and I'll get it fixed right up!

How do I go about moving them without causing problems then.

For example, let's say I am moving Rune Page 1 and Rune Page 2 around; when I click on Rune Page 3 within the drop-down list, a popup will show saying "There are unsaved changes in your runepage, do you wish to save the changes? Yes / No".

Do I click YES or do I click NO? I never changed the actual runes themselves, just the order of the pages in the menu.

This also pops up if I click on any other menu item like lobby, home, etc.

If I instead click on one of the rune pages I moved (in this scenario, 1 and/or 2), no popup shows and instead I have the option to either click on the golden highlighted "SAVE" button on the top right within the rune page editing screen, or simply just continue back to the lobby without saving anything.

There is an issue when you move rune pages around then do some combination of clicking either SAVE, and/or "YES", or "NO" on the "Do you wish to save changes" popup. That's how they get linked together and messed up. I just don't remember the _bad combination/way_ that causes the problem OR the _right combination/way_ to move the pages around without causing the problem.
